entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
